code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var cartSlice=createSlice({name:"cart",initialState:{items:[],totalAmount:0},reducers:{addItemToCart:function addItemToCart(state,action){var newItem=action.payload;var existingItem=state.items.find(function(item){return item.id===newItem.id;});if(!existingItem){state.items.push({id:newItem.id,price:newItem.price,title:newItem.title});state.totalAmount=state.totalAmount+ +newItem.price;}},removeItemFromCart:function removeItemFromCart(state,action){var id=action.payload;var existingItem=state.items.find(function(item){return item.id===id;});state.totalAmount=state.totalAmount-existingItem.price;state.items=state.items.filter(function(item){return item.id!==id;});},clearCart:function clearCart(state){state={items:[],totalAmount:0};}}});export default cartSlice;export var cartActions=cartSlice.actions;
